title: Honduras: Citi Presents a New Exclusive Card for Its Clients
summary: Tegucigalpa, Honduras - Citi announced today the launch of its new and exclusive Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card, which offers Citi clients more privileges and improved benefits, inviting them to pursue continued growth in a world of prestige and distinction.
tag-1: Honduras: Citi Presents a New Exclusive Card for Its Clients
tag-3: Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Citi announced today the launch of its new and exclusive Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card, which offers Citi clients more privileges and improved benefits, inviting them to pursue continued growth in a world of prestige and distinction.

tag-8: "At Citi we are always looking for ways to offer our clients the best products. That's why with the new Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card, we are putting at their disposal a world of privileges and benefits that is unique in the region," said Marco Lopez, Credit Card Director, Citi Central America.
tag-9: "It is a pleasure for the airlines of AviancaTaca to be part of this partnership that benefits our mutual clients with Citi, with whom we have built a long-term business relationship. Both organizations work hard to provide a high level of value to our clients, according to their tastes and preferences," commented Mauricio Angulo, Director of Business Management and Development, LifeMiles.
tag-10: "Cardholders with high purchasing power represent an increasingly strategic segment for Visa, due to the constant growth of this market," explained Rogelio Sanchez, Executive Director for Central America at Visa Inc., Latin America and the Caribbean. "This launch demonstrates our commitment to offering a portfolio of products with a comprehensive platform of benefits that suit consumers' lifestyles and assure their peace of mind when they travel and make purchases."
tag-11: We invite you to request the Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card so that you too can begin to enjoy all of the benefits and privileges it offers.

tag-17: Avianca and Taca Avianca and Taca, along with other regional airlines, together form AviancaTaca Holding S.A., offering air services to various parts of Latin America, the United States and Europe. With a modern fleet of more than 150 planes for short-, medium- and long-haul flights and an exceptional team of more than 17,000 employees, Avianca and Taca provide direct service to more than 100 destinations in 25 countries, which in turn provide connecting service to another 750 destinations around the world via partner airlines. More than five million members are enrolled in the group's loyalty program, taking advantage of a multi-hub operating model that offers passengers multiple flight options from centers of operation in Bogotá, Colombia; San Salvador, El Salvador; Lima, Peru and San José, Costa Rica, The airline group also offers a wide portfolio of aeronautic products and services, including air cargo, courier services, specialized aeronautic assistance and tourism packages. For more information about the airlines, please visit www.taca.com or www.avianca.com.
tag-18: LifeMiles is a trademark of LifeMiles Corp.
tag-19: Visa Visa is a global payments technology company that connects consumers, businesses, banks and governments in more than 200 countries and territories to fast, secure and reliable electronic pay-ments. Visa operates one of the world's most advanced processing networks – VisaNet – capable of handling more than 24,000 transactions per second, offering fraud protection for consumers and guaranteed payment for merchants. Visa is not a bank and does not issue cards, extend credit or set rates and fees for consumers. Visa's innovations, however, enable its bank customers to offer con-sumers more choices: Pay now with debit, ahead of time with prepaid or later with credit products. For more information, visit www.corporate.visa.com
